title: BSC node stuck after HF
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: git_tag=v2.31.0-rc.4

OS & Version: Debian/Linux

#### Expected behaviour
BSC chain should not be stuck

#### Actual behaviour
BSC chain is stuck at block 23846018

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
I did multiple times an unwind
`build/bin/integration stage_headers --unwind=100 --chain=bsc --datadir /home/bscnode/.bsc`
then start erigon
`erigon --chain=bsc --prune=hrtc --db.pagesize=16k --http --private.api.addr= --http.api=eth,web3,trace,txpool --snap.stop --torrent.port 42070 --http.port 18545 --port 30404 --datadir /home/bscnode/.bsc --maxpeers 256`

then it says
`WARN[12-13|09:23:38.490] [7/16 Execution] Execution failed block=23846019 hash=0xef64dbe0ffe29689184c4a5c075f8d23fd6f9463c4cdc2ccc64eabda7354a1f6 err="expected system tx (hash 0xb492578c0742f89c5fac41cdd72d244b1758063319bd074df43e761088ce1e25, nonce 41216, to 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000001000, value 0x109286049017740, gas 9223372036854775807, gasPrice 0x0, data f340fa01000000000000000000000000d1d6bf74282782b0b3eb1413c901d6ecf02e8e28), actual tx (hash 0xd9fcd3f24acf6855ce04d3bec42f8188b56b8a5dcb27434cc7ed23c2062ce58d, nonce 41216, to 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000001000, value 0x1092907ec599740, gas 9223372036854775807, gasPrice 0x0, data f340fa01000000000000000000000000d1d6bf74282782b0b3eb1413c901d6ecf02e8e28)"`

it is then stuck and logs repeat saying
`INFO[12-13|09:25:20.785] [2/16 Headers] No block headers to write in this log period block number=23846018`

yes, me too. I am hitting the same issue:

Dec 14 05:19:33 ip-172-31-0-59 start_erigon_service.sh[1526535]: [INFO] [12-14|05:19:33.559] [5/16 Bodies] Processed                  highest=23888344
Dec 14 05:19:33 ip-172-31-0-59 start_erigon_service.sh[1526535]: [INFO] [12-14|05:19:33.559] [5/16 Bodies] DONE                       in=9m7.263633606s

Dec 14 05:20:28 ip-172-31-0-59 start_erigon_service.sh[1526535]: [INFO] [12-14|05:20:28.677] [7/16 Execution] Blocks execution        from=23846018 to=23888344

I Got this Error either now.


[INFO] [12-14|14:53:56.001] [5/16 Bodies] No block bodies to write in this log period block number=23871451

how can i fix this?
i also encounter this problem, how to deal with it

same issue  ,erigon version  2.30.0-stable
`WARN[12-16|08:09:17.740] [7/16 Execution] Execution failed        block=23846019 hash=0xef64dbe0ffe29689184c4a5c075f8d23fd6f9463c4cdc2ccc64eabda7354a1f6 err="expected system tx (hash 0xb492578c0742f89c5fac41cdd72d244b1758063319bd074df43e761088ce1e25, nonce 41216, to 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000001000, value 0x109286049017740, gas 9223372036854775807, gasPrice 0x0, data f340fa01000000000000000000000000d1d6bf74282782b0b3eb1413c901d6ecf02e8e28), actual tx (hash 0xd9fcd3f24acf6855ce04d3bec42f8188b56b8a5dcb27434cc7ed23c2062ce58d, nonce 41216, to 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000001000, value 0x1092907ec599740, gas 9223372036854775807, gasPrice 0x0, data f340fa01000000000000000000000000d1d6bf74282782b0b3eb1413c901d6ecf02e8e28)"`
the tx does not exists in bscscan **0xb492578c0742f89c5fac41cdd72d244b1758063319bd074df43e761088ce1e25**
this happen again afer unwind
This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
This issue was closed because it has been stalled for 7 days with no activity.
